ee.ria.dhx.ws.service

Interface DhxMarshallerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DhxMarshallerServiceImpl

    public interface DhxMarshallerService
    Methods related to XSD and marshalling. e.g. marshalling, unmarshalling , validating
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

    • Method Detail

      • unmarshall

        <T> T unmarshall(javax.xml.transform.Source source)
          throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method parses(unmarshalls) object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - type of the capsule being unmarshalled
        Parameters:
        source - - source of the marshalled object
        Returns:
        - unmarshalled object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while unmrashalling object

        Returns:
        - parsed(unmarshalled) object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while parsing file

      • unmarshallAndValidate

        <T> T unmarshallAndValidate(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                            java.io.InputStream schemaStream)
                     throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Parses(unmarshalls) object from file. And does validation against XSD schema if schemaStream is present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - type of the capsule being unmarshalled
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream of to parse
        schemaStream - - stream on XSD schema against which to validate. No validation is done if stream is NULL
        Returns:
        - parsed(unmarshalled) object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while parsing file

      • unmarshallAndValidate

        @Loggable
<T> T unmarshallAndValidate(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                       java.io.InputStream schemaStream)
                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Parses(unmarshalls) object from file. And does validation against XSD schema if schemaStream is present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - type of the capsule being unmarshalled
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to parse
        schemaStream - - stream on XSD schema against which to validate. No validation is done if stream is NULL
        Returns:
        - parsed(unmarshalled) object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while parsing file

      • marshallToOutputStream

        void marshallToOutputStream(java.lang.Object container,
                            java.io.OutputStream stream)
                     throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Marshalls object to outputStream.
        Parameters:
        container - - object to marshall
        stream - - containing marshalled object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while marshalling object

      • marshallToOutputStreamNoNamespacePrefixes

        void marshallToOutputStreamNoNamespacePrefixes(java.lang.Object container,
                                               java.io.OutputStream stream,
                                               java.lang.Boolean includeXmlns)
                                        throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Marshalls object to outputStream, removes all namespace prefixes from XML.
        Parameters:
        container - - object to marshall
        stream - - containing marshalled object
        includeXmlns - if true, then xmlns will be added
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while marshalling object

      • marshallToResult

        void marshallToResult(java.lang.Object obj,
                      javax.xml.transform.Result result)
               throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Marshalls object to result.
        Parameters:
        obj - - object to marshall
        result - - result into which object will be marshalled
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while marshalling object

                                          throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Marshalls object to writer and validates.
        Parameters:
        container - - object to marshall
        schemaStream - - stream of the XSD schema to validate against
        Returns:
        - file containing marshalled object
        Throws:

        file - - file to validate
        schemaStream - - stream caontaining XSD schema
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • validate

        void validate(java.io.InputStream fileStream,
              java.io.InputStream schemaStream)
       throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Function validates file against XSD schema.
        Parameters:
        fileStream - - stream to validate
        schemaStream - - stream containing schema against which to validate
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if file is not validated against XSD schema.
